availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles S. Stoy (Lebanon, Marion Co. watchmaker)

body.p: Lebanon, Kentucky, watchmaker. Pennsylvania native. Married to Margret A. Stoy. Father of Ellen H. Stoy and Henry W. Stoy.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon District 1, p. 39. Find A Grave, Entry for Charles S. Stoy (unknown-1902), Find A Grave Memorial #140921620 http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=140921620&ref=acom (accessed 14 June 2016).
